judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Mr. Justice Roberts concurs in the result.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed on able opinion of President Judge Sloane, 36 Pa. D. & C. 2d 723. Each party to pay own costs.
Mr. Justice Roberts concurs in the result.
Mr. Justice Cohen dissents.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Robert D. Abrahams, with him Albert Momjian, and Abrahams & Loewenstein, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Cosfol, Appellant, v. Varvoutis.
Argued April 26, 1965.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Laurence H. Eldredge, for appellants.
Robert D. Abrahams, with him Albert Momjian, and Abrahams & Loewenstein, for appellees.
September 29, 1965:
